abstract: Resets the tips’ datastore to the initial state for re-testing tip display rules and eligibility.
overview:
## Overview

Must be called before [doc://com.apple.TipKit/documentation/TipKit/Tips/configure(_:)].

This function can also be called with the launch argument `-com.apple.TipKit.ResetDatastore 1`.

items.description: Show all tips regardless of their display rule eligibility or display frequency status for UI testing of tips.
items.name: showAllTipsForTesting()

items.description: Show specified tips regardless of their display rule eligibility or display frequency status for UI testing of certain tips.
items.name: showTipsForTesting(_:)

items.description: Hide all tips regardless of their display rule eligibility for UI testing without tips.
items.name: hideAllTipsForTesting()

items.description: Hide specified tips regardless of their display rule eligibility for UI testing without certain tips.
items.name: hideTipsForTesting(_:)

title: resetDatastore()
